channel.title: how do i fix "java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException"
channel.description:
how do i fix "java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException"
[code]ScapeOfDeath BETA (C)Rich Kid, Eekz Server on 0.0.0.0: ClientHandler: Accepted Connection Fully ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost: Client type: high memory version UserId: 82128902 mime is signing onto server. LOADED: 0 [client-1-mime]: npcIndex: 13 magicID: 12891 Error at magic on npcs! [client-1-mime]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10000 [client-1-mime]: Case 185: Action Button: 3144 [client-1-mime]: Auto saved game. [client-1-mime]: Auto saving moreinfo file... [client-1-mime]: Successfuly auto saved moreinfo file. Game saved for player mime ClientHandler: Client mime disconnected.[/code]
i cant log back in after that i get this
[code]ClientHandler: Client mime disconnected. ClientHandler: Rejected localhost: ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:[/code]
any help[br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2007, 02:36:12 PM[/size][hr]some1 help plz
